issues.description: Inconsistent case usage throughout the file
suggestions: Use consistent case: either all lowercase or mixed case with proper capitalization
Follow IEEE standard: library names lowercase, entity/architecture names mixed case
issues.reasoning: Inconsistent casing makes code harder to read and maintain.

issues.description: Missing spaces around operators and keywords
suggestions: Add spaces around operators: 'clk : in std_logic' instead of 'clk:in std_logic'
Add spaces around keywords: 'if rst = '1' then' instead of 'if rst='1'then'
issues.reasoning: Proper spacing improves code readability and follows VHDL style guidelines.

suggestions: Include all signals used in the process: 'process(clk, rst, data)'
Or use 'process(all)' for automatic sensitivity list (VHDL-2008)
issues.reasoning: Incomplete sensitivity list can cause simulation/synthesis mismatches.
rising_edge() is more readable and less error-prone than manual edge detection.
Descriptive names improve code readability and maintainability.
